China:
Ayurbarwada died.
Ayurbarwada's son Gegeen Khan became emperor of the Yuan dynasty.
Italy: Dante Alighieri finished writing his Divine Comedy.
Peru: Mayta Cápac was succeeded by his son Cápac Yupanqui.
Poland: Coronation of Władysław I the Elbow-high
Singapore: The Mongol court sends a mission to obtain elephants from Long Ya Men (or Dragon's Tooth Strait), believed to be Keppel Harbour.
